General.Name: Joong Ang Enervis Co. Ltd
General.Description: Joong Ang Enervis Co., Ltd markets petroleum products in South Korea. The company is also involved in power generation. Joong Ang Enervis Co., Ltd was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
